SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am16
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am16.client.view.cli

Class CLIInputManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am16.client.view.cli.CLIInputManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class CLIInputManager extends Object implements Runnable
Runnable class to manage user input in the Command Line Interface. The only parts of this class that are thread safe are the methods addCommand(it.polimi.ingsw.am16.client.view.cli.CLICommand), removeCommand(it.polimi.ingsw.am16.client.view.cli.CLICommand), getAllowedCommands() and clearCommands(). All other methods should never be called by multiple threads.

    • CLIInputManager

      public CLIInputManager(CLI cliView, InputStream inputStream)
      Creates a new manager for user input.
      Parameters:
      cliView - The view that this manager's input should affect.
      inputStream - The InputStream to read user input from.

  • Method Details

    • setServerInterface

      public void setServerInterface(ServerInterface serverInterface)
      Sets this user input manager's server interface. Used so that this manager can communicate to the server when needed.
      Parameters:
      serverInterface - The server interface.

    • run

      public void run()
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • parseCommand

      private void parseCommand(String input)

    • commandMatch

      private Set<CLICommand> commandMatch(String input)
      Checks the user input against all the available commands and returns a set that contains all the commands that match.
      Parameters:
      input - The user's input.
      Returns:
      The set containing all commands that match the input, even partially and through aliases. Please note that if any command matches exactly, only it will be returned and not any partial matches.

    • addCommand

      public void addCommand(CLICommand command)
      Adds a command to the set of allowed commands.
      Parameters:
      command - The new command to add.

    • removeCommand

      public void removeCommand(CLICommand command)
      Removes a command from the set of allowed commands.
      Parameters:
      command - The command to remove.

    • getAllowedCommands

      public Set<CLICommand> getAllowedCommands()
      Returns:
      The set of currently allowed commands in this user input manager.

    • clearCommands

      public void clearCommands()
      Clears the set of allowed commands. After this method is run, no commands will be accepted unless they are added back with the addCommand(it.polimi.ingsw.am16.client.view.cli.CLICommand) method.
